WRITING.TEXT: I do, I'll have to dig them up. What's Rocket League? Aw, that's great! How old is your kid?
Haha not quite, but still very funny.
Hockey (watching and playing) and comedy (watching, writing, and performing). What about you? I guess motorcycles?
I'm mostly not an interesting person, y'know? I don't have fun stories and I'm not a scintillating guy. I'm a good person, just not a thrilling one.
I have not, but I do like NWA so how bad can it be? Let me know if you enjoy it - I certainly hope you do!

I'm mostly not really an interesting person, so I'd consider that boring. I think so. Every now and again I engage in interesting things, so as long as there is at least one person who does at least one less interesting thing than I, then there is someone more boring.
A nightmare on both sides. Both parties really scraped the bottom of the barrel for 2016.
I hope you enjoy if you do!

There's a book called "Chasing Shakespeares" if you're interested. I had to read it but I didn't really, which is probably why I didn't love it.
I believe he was real, but it's an interesting argument. Ever read Hamlet?

An excellent question. I may bring back Shakespeare to talk to him (and see if he's even a real person: I think he is, but some speculate he was just a random guy that great writers used as an alias). I'd also wonder how he could write about today's times, if at all.
Bring them back to today to do a job? Or to talk/hang out with them?
Didn't see it, probably won't (in theaters at least). Much like every other movie, I'll see it years later on DVD.

WRITING.TITLE: I'm just a random, rather boring guy. AMA!
WRITING.TEXT: I think the title says it all!
Awesome! Do you know any people who would be interested also?
